title: Ryoumin 0-nin Start no Henkyou Ryoushu-sama: Ao no Dias to Soukaku no Otome
title_english: The Frontier Lord Begins with Zero Subjects: Tales of Blue Dias and the Onikin Alna
title_japanese: 領民0人スタートの辺境領主様～青のディアスと蒼角の乙女～
title_synonyms: The Population of the Frontier Owner Starts with 0. "Dias the Blue" and a Blue Horned Girl.
The Frontier Lord Begins with Zero Subjects: Tales of Blue Dias and the Beastkin Alna
synopsis:
After decades of war, Dias returns home as a hero and is rewarded with his own domain. When he arrives at his new lands, however, they turn out to be little more than endless grassy plains without even a single subject. Literally put out to pasture, Dias is stumped as to how to live any life other than a soldier's. But when a horned girl named Alna crosses his path, Dias takes his first steps to being the lord of a not-so-empty frontier.

(Source: J-Novel Club)
background: Ryoumin 0-nin Start no Henkyou Ryoushu-sama: Ao no Dias to Soukaku no Otome has been published digitally in English as The Frontier Lord Begins with Zero Subjects: Tales of Blue Dias and the Onikin Alna by J-Novel Club since September 13, 2023.
